Best of Italy | Trafalgar Tours | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Best of Italy 13 days | Rome roundtrip Embark on an enchanting voyage through Italy, a land where every corner is steeped in history, culture, and natural splendor. Your journey commences in Rome, the Eternal City, where ancient marvels like the Colosseum and the Vatican beckon you to delve into the rich tapestry of Roman civilization. From there, your adventure continues to Florence, where the genius of Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci adorns the cityscape. Lose yourself in the maze of cobblestone streets, where every corner reveals another architectural masterpiece or artistic treasure. But Italy's allure extends beyond its famous cities. Immerse yourself in the serene ambiance of Assisi, spending a night in a meticulously restored Franciscan monastery and absorbing the spiritual ambiance of this historic town. Next, you'll venture to the glamorous island of Capri, where azure waters lap against rugged cliffs and chic boutiques line the charming streets. Explore hidden coves, vibrant markets, and panoramic viewpoints, immersing yourself in the essence of la dolce vita. Finally, your journey culminates with a private guided tour of Pompeii, where the haunting ruins of this ancient Roman city offer a poignant glimpse into the past. Walk amidst the preserved streets and buildings, frozen in time by the catastrophic eruption of Mount Vesuvius. This comprehensive tour promises an unforgettable odyssey through the heart and soul of Italy.
